inbox.subject: 90DegreeTeamTask Gmail Integration connected to your Google Account
inbox.body:
90DegreeTeamTask Gmail Integration connected to your Google Account
Hi Kreyon,
90DegreeTeamTask Gmail Integration now has access to your Google Account kreyonsoftwares@gmail.com.
90DegreeTeamTask Gmail Integration can:
- View your email messages and settings - Send email on your behalf
You should only give this access to apps you trust. Review or remove apps connected to your account any time at My Account <https: myaccount.google.com="" permissions="">.
Learn more <https: support.google.com="" accounts="" answer="" 3466521=""> about what it means to connect an app to your account. The Google Accounts team
This email can't receive replies. For more information, visit the Google Accounts Help Center <https: support.google.com="" accounts="" answer="" 3466521="">.
You received this mandatory email service announcement to update you about important changes to your Google product or account.
© 2018 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA 1542206960000000 </https:></https:></https:>
